title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 199.3 - Segregation of unsterilized articles of bedding or materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 199.3 - Segregation of unsterilized articles of bedding or materials

State Regulations

All bedding and other materials which have not been
sanitized in accordance with this Part shall be separately stored and
completely segregated from new or sanitized articles or
materials. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
199.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
